   contain the root `toctree` directive.

************************************
**Welcome to PuMA's documentation!**
************************************

PuMA's code can be found `here. <https://github.com/KVD-lab/puma>`_ PuMA is also available through `iMicrobe. <https://www.imicrobe.us>`_

**********
About PuMA
**********

PuMA is a pipeline written in Python 3 for papillomavirus genome annotation. This pipline was created by utilizaing `Biopython <https://biopython.org>`_, `BLAST <https://blast.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Blast.cgi?PAGE_TYPE=BlastDocs>`_, `MEME, FIMO <https://meme-suite.org/>`_, `MUSCLE <https://www.drive5.com/muscle>`_. For more information on how PuMA works, refer to 'How PuMA Works'.

Support
*******

For any questions, please contact Dr. Koenraad Van Doorslaer at  vandoorslaer@email.arizona.edu. Or visit the KVD Lab `website <http://vandoorslaer.info>`_.
